findings.title: Single lockfile sanity
findings.suggestion: Keep only one of package-lock.json, pnpm-lock.yaml, or yarn.lock to avoid conflicts.

findings.title: Test files present
findings.suggestion: Ensure test files live under a consistent directory (e.g., tests/ or e2e/).

findings.title: Prettier config present
findings.suggestion: Great—ensure your CI runs formatting checks.

findings.title: .vscode folder present
findings.suggestion: Consider sharing recommended extensions and settings for the repo.

findings.title: GitHub Actions workflows folder
findings.suggestion: Ensure CI covers lint, typecheck, tests, and artifacts upload.

findings.title: Node version file present
findings.suggestion: Add .nvmrc or .node-version to pin Node across environments.

findings.title: Monorepo workspace detected
findings.suggestion: If repo grows, consider workspaces for multi-package management.

findings.title: TypeScript ESLint integration
findings.suggestion: Install @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin & @typescript-eslint/parser and remove legacy "typescript-eslint".

findings.title: TypeScript typecheck script
findings.suggestion: Add "typecheck": "tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit".

findings.title: Playwright test script
findings.suggestion: Add "test": "playwright test" (and consider CI variants like "--reporter=line").

findings.title: ESLint + Prettier integration
findings.suggestion: Install "prettier" and "eslint-config-prettier"; extend it last in ESLint config.

findings.title: Husky installed & prepared
findings.message: Husky installed, "prepare" script set, and .husky/ present.
findings.suggestion: Add "prepare": "husky install" and run it once to create .husky/.

findings.title: lint-staged configured
findings.suggestion: Add a lint-staged config (e.g., format TS/JS/JSON/MD on pre-commit).

findings.title: No floating dependency versions
findings.message: All versions pinned with a range (^ or ~) or exact.

findings.title: Single lockfile present
findings.suggestion: Commit your lockfile to ensure reproducible installs.

findings.title: Modern date/time library
findings.message: Using "moment". Consider "dayjs" or "date-fns" for smaller footprint.
findings.suggestion: Migrate to "dayjs" or "date-fns" where possible.

findings.title: Avoid duplicate data-gen libraries
findings.suggestion: Standardize on one data generator to reduce bundle size and surface area.

findings.title: Node engine specified
findings.suggestion: Add "engines": { "node": ">=18 <23" } (or whichever LTS you target).

findings.title: ESM tooling coherence
findings.suggestion: Prefer "tsx" for running TS in ESM projects.

findings.title: Clean script exists for artifacts
findings.suggestion: Add "clean": "rimraf test-results trace screenshots downloads coverage" to keep repo tidy.

findings.title: Test runner overlap awareness
findings.message: Single-runner setup or clear separation assumed.

findings.title: use block present
findings.suggestion: Add a `use: { ... }` section for trace/screenshot/video/baseURL defaults

findings.title: Tracing enabled/configured
findings.message: Trace configured, but not set to on/retain-on-failure/on-first-retry
findings.suggestion: Set `use: { trace: "retain-on-failure" }` for effective debugging

findings.title: Screenshot enabled/configured
findings.suggestion: Set `use: { screenshot: "only-on-failure" }`

findings.title: Retries >= 1
findings.suggestion: Set `retries: 1` (or a CI ternary like `process.env.CI ? 2 : 1`)

findings.title: Workers configured
findings.suggestion: Set `workers: process.env.CI ? 1 : 4` (adjust for your infra)

findings.title: Headless default true
findings.message: Headless not set to true by default
findings.suggestion: Use `use: { headless: true }` to avoid GUI overhead in CI

findings.title: Parallel projects configured
findings.suggestion: Use projects for browser matrix (Chromium/Firefox/WebKit) or device profiles

findings.title: HTML reporter enabled
findings.suggestion: Add `reporter: [["list"], ["html", { open: "never" }]]` to persist interactive reports

findings.title: JUnit reporter (optional)
findings.suggestion: Consider adding `["junit", { outputFile: "test-results/junit.xml" }]` for CI insights

findings.title: Base URL configured
findings.suggestion: Set `use: { baseURL: process.env.BASE_URL || "http://localhost:3000" }`

findings.title: Video capture set
findings.suggestion: Use `use: { video: "on-first-retry" }` to capture flaky tests

findings.title: expect.timeout configured
findings.suggestion: Set `expect: { timeout: 10000 }` to control default assertion timeout per expect()

findings.title: Per-test timeout sane (≤ 60s)
findings.suggestion: Prefer explicit waits/assertions and keep per-test timeout ≤ 60s; rely on expect timeouts

findings.title: outputDir configured
findings.suggestion: Set `outputDir: "test-results/"` to keep results organized for CI artifact upload

findings.title: webServer with reuseExistingServer
findings.message: `webServer` present but `reuseExistingServer` not set to true
findings.suggestion: Configure `webServer` to start your app for E2E and set `reuseExistingServer: true` to speed up local runs

findings.title: Readable structure (describe/step)
findings.suggestion: Use test.describe/test.step to group and narrate test flows.

findings.title: Soft assertions when appropriate
findings.suggestion: Use expect.soft for non-critical checks so the test collects multiple failures.

findings.title: Custom fixtures or test.use present
findings.suggestion: Use test.extend/test.use to share setup, context, and per-test options.

findings.title: Avoid waitForTimeout anti-pattern
findings.suggestion: Replace waitForTimeout with locator assertions (e.g., await expect(locator).toBeVisible()).

findings.title: Prefer locator assertions over waitForSelector
findings.suggestion: Prefer await expect(locator).toBeVisible()/toHaveText() etc. Locator assertions auto-wait and are more resilient.

findings.title: No focused tests committed
findings.suggestion: Delete .only before pushing; enforce via a pre-commit/CI grep to block focused tests.

findings.title: Reasonable use of skip/fixme
findings.suggestion: Keep skip/fixme temporary; track issues and remove regularly to avoid masking failures.

findings.title: Snapshot/visual assertions
findings.suggestion: Use toHaveScreenshot()/toMatchSnapshot() for regressions where DOM/text checks are insufficient.

findings.title: Suite-level parallelization used
findings.suggestion: Consider parallel mode for independent suites to reduce runtime; ensure test isolation first.

findings.title: Network mocking used where appropriate
findings.message: No route() usage detected in tests
findings.suggestion: Mock network for flaky/slow dependencies to make tests deterministic; prefer page.route for per-test scope.

findings.title: Explicit test timeouts kept minimal
findings.suggestion: Use explicit timeouts sparingly; fix root causes instead. If needed, annotate justification in code review.

findings.title: Avoid XPath selectors
findings.suggestion: Prefer role/test id/user-facing locators instead of //xpath.

findings.title: Use getByRole for semantics
findings.suggestion: Prefer getByRole with a meaningful accessible name for resilient locators.

findings.title: Accessible name with getByRole
findings.suggestion: When using getByRole, pass an explicit { name: /text/ } to target the intended element.

findings.title: Use test IDs for stability
findings.message: Stable test ID locators found in 1 file(s)
findings.suggestion: Introduce data-testid attributes for key elements and use getByTestId or [data-testid=...] selectors.

findings.title: App instrumented with data-testid
findings.message: No 'data-testid' attributes found in scanned files
findings.suggestion: Consider adding data-testid attributes to critical elements for robust selectors.

findings.title: Use user-facing locators
findings.message: User-facing getBy* APIs used in 7 file(s)
findings.suggestion: Prefer getByText/Label/Placeholder/AltText/Title where appropriate to align with how users interact.

findings.title: Avoid brittle nth() chaining
findings.suggestion: Target unique roles/test IDs or tighter scopes instead of relying on indexes.

findings.title: Avoid regex getByText
findings.suggestion: Prefer exact strings or accessible role+name. Regex text selectors can be brittle and slow.

findings.title: Avoid :has-text() pseudo
findings.suggestion: Use getByText / getByRole({ name }) / hasText option on locator() instead of :has-text().

findings.title: Avoid :nth-child() in selectors
findings.suggestion: Prefer semantic locators (role/name or test IDs) rather than positional CSS like :nth-child().

findings.title: Retries >= 1
findings.suggestion: Set retries: 1 (CI can be 2–3) to reduce flake impact.

findings.title: forbidOnly enabled (CI safety)
findings.suggestion: Add `forbidOnly: !!process.env.CI` in Playwright config.

findings.title: Reasonable per-test timeout (≤60s)
findings.suggestion: Keep per-test timeout ≤ 60s; use targeted waits for slow parts.

findings.title: Reasonable actionTimeout (≤30s)
findings.suggestion: Keep actionTimeout ≤ 30s to fail fast on stuck UI actions.

findings.title: Reasonable navigationTimeout (≤30s)
findings.suggestion: Keep navigationTimeout ≤ 30s; prefer route mocking for slow externals.

findings.title: expect timeout (≤10s)
findings.suggestion: Use `expect: { timeout: 5_000–10_000 }` and soft expects sparingly.

findings.title: Trace on retain-on-failure
findings.suggestion: Use `trace: "retain-on-failure"` (or "on-first-retry") to speed up flake debug.

findings.title: Screenshot only on failure
findings.suggestion: Use `screenshot: "only-on-failure"` to keep CI lean but helpful.

findings.title: Video retain on failure (or off)
findings.suggestion: Prefer `video: "retain-on-failure"` (or `off` if traces are enough).

findings.title: Fully-parallel usage awareness
findings.message: fullyParallel enabled; ensure tests are stateless and isolated.
findings.suggestion: If you see heisenbugs, try per-file parallelism or mark stateful suites serial.

findings.title: Sane workers count
findings.suggestion: Use a modest workers value in CI (e.g., 2–4) for stability.

findings.title: Avoid waitForTimeout sleeps
findings.message: No waitForTimeout() found in sampled tests
findings.suggestion: Replace sleeps with explicit waits, e.g., `await expect(locator).toBeVisible()`.

findings.title: Avoid networkidle waits on dynamic apps
findings.message: No networkidle waits detected in sampled tests
findings.suggestion: Prefer specific UI/route signals over networkidle on long-polling apps.

findings.title: Avoid broad serial mode
findings.message: No broad serial mode detected in sampled tests
findings.suggestion: Limit serial mode to truly stateful suites; prefer setup/teardown.

findings.title: HTML report persisted
findings.message: HTML report not uploaded as artifact
findings.suggestion: Upload `playwright-report` (or your HTML report path) as an artifact via actions/upload-artifact.

findings.title: HTML reporter configured
findings.suggestion: Enable the built-in HTML reporter for local triage.

findings.title: JUnit reporter for CI
findings.suggestion: Add JUnit reporter so CI systems can parse results.

findings.title: JSON reporter available
findings.suggestion: JSON reporter is useful for custom dashboards or post-processing in CI.

findings.title: Allure reporting configured
findings.suggestion: If you use Allure, install allure-playwright and wire the reporter; upload allure-results in CI.

findings.title: Monocart reporter configured
findings.suggestion: Monocart provides a rich single-file report that is easy to archive in CI.

findings.title: HTML report persisted
findings.message: HTML report not uploaded as artifact
findings.suggestion: Upload `playwright-report` as an artifact in CI.

findings.title: Traces persisted
findings.message: No trace artifacts detected in repo/CI
findings.suggestion: Enable `trace: "retain-on-failure"` and upload trace/*.zip in CI.

findings.title: Screenshots persisted
findings.suggestion: Use `screenshot: "only-on-failure"` and upload the folder in CI.

findings.title: Allure results persisted
findings.suggestion: Upload `allure-results/` in CI and publish the report (`allure generate` or action).

findings.title: Trace enabled on failures
findings.suggestion: Set `use: { trace: "retain-on-failure" }` or "on-first-retry".

findings.title: Screenshots on failure
findings.suggestion: Set `use: { screenshot: "only-on-failure" }`.

findings.title: Video capture policy
findings.suggestion: If helpful, set `video: "retain-on-failure"` and upload in CI.

findings.title: Output directory set
findings.suggestion: Set top-level `outputDir` to a stable path to collect artifacts.

findings.title: Attachments in tests
findings.suggestion: Use `test.info().attach(name, { body, contentType })` to include logs, HARs, or snapshots in reports.

findings.title: Structured steps in tests
findings.suggestion: Wrap logical actions in `await test.step("description", async () => { ... })` for clearer reports.

findings.title: Pipeline ready
findings.message: GitHub Actions or GitLab CI detected
findings.suggestion: Add GitHub Actions under .github/workflows/ or a .gitlab-ci.yml file

findings.title: Playwright install in CI
findings.suggestion: Add a step: `npx playwright install --with-deps` (Linux) before running tests

findings.title: Node setup (version & cache)
findings.message: Node setup and/or dependency cache not configured
findings.suggestion: Use actions/setup-node with `cache: npm|yarn|pnpm` or GitLab `cache:` with a key to speed up installs

findings.title: Dependency cache enabled
findings.suggestion: Enable actions/cache (GH) or the `cache:` key (GL) to cache node_modules or package managers

findings.title: Test report storage/archiving
findings.suggestion: Upload HTML report, traces, screenshots as CI artifacts for debugging

findings.title: Artifacts retention set
findings.message: No retention/expire policy found for artifacts
findings.suggestion: Set `retention-days:` (GH) or `expire_in:` (GL) to control artifact lifecycle

findings.title: Parallel/sharding configured
findings.suggestion: Use matrix/parallel (GH/GL) or `--shard=N/M` for faster CI runs

findings.title: Retries enabled in CI
findings.message: No retries found in CI job
findings.suggestion: Pass `--retries 2` to `npx playwright test` or use `retry:` in GitLab

findings.title: PR/MR triggers
findings.suggestion: GitHub: add `on: pull_request`. GitLab: use `only: [merge_requests]` or rules.

findings.title: Coverage uploaded/published
findings.suggestion: Upload LCOV to Codecov or persist coverage artifacts for trend tracking

findings.title: Cancel in-progress runs (GH)
findings.message: Consider cancelling in-progress runs on new commits
findings.suggestion: Add `concurrency: { group: ${{ github.ref }}, cancel-in-progress: true }`

findings.title: Headless display (xvfb) / system deps
findings.message: xvfb or system deps configured for browsers
findings.suggestion: Use `npx playwright install --with-deps` and/or run tests under `xvfb-run` on Linux runners

findings.title: HTML report persisted
findings.message: HTML report not uploaded as artifact
findings.suggestion: Upload `playwright-report` (or your HTML report path) as an artifact

findings.title: Traces/screenshots persisted
findings.suggestion: Upload `test-results`, `traces`, or screenshots folder as an artifact

findings.title: Mocks via route()
findings.suggestion: Use page.route() or browserContext.route() to intercept and mock network calls.

findings.title: Use route.fulfill for mocked responses
findings.suggestion: Prefer await route.fulfill({ status, contentType, body }) for deterministic mocks. Consider storing payloads as fixtures.

findings.title: Use route.abort to simulate failures
findings.suggestion: Use await route.abort() to simulate network errors/timeouts and test resilience paths.

findings.title: Use route.continue for passthrough
findings.suggestion: Use await route.continue() when only modifying headers/method/url before allowing the request.

findings.title: Avoid chained route.route
findings.suggestion: Chaining route.route() can lead to complex, hard-to-debug flows. Prefer a single interception per request.

findings.title: HAR-based network mocking
findings.suggestion: Use routeFromHAR for realistic recordings of network traffic and faster, stable tests when the backend is volatile.

findings.title: Prefer page.route over context.route
findings.message: No browserContext.route usage detected (good for isolation)
findings.suggestion: Use page.route where possible to scope mocks to a single test. If using context.route, ensure proper setup/teardown.

findings.title: Request event handling
findings.suggestion: Use request events for diagnostics (logging, assertions). Prefer route() for deterministic mocking.

findings.title: Route defined without action
findings.message: All route() usages appear to take an action
findings.suggestion: Every interception should either fulfill, abort, or continue the request; otherwise it can hang or behave unexpectedly.

findings.title: Readable assertions & retries configured
findings.suggestion: Set `retries: 1` (or `process.env.CI ? 2 : 1`) to absorb flakiness.

findings.title: Parallel/headless execution configured
findings.suggestion: Set `use: { headless: true }` and tune `workers` or `projects` for scale.

findings.title: Reusable helpers/pages present
findings.suggestion: Factor common flows into Page Object classes (`src/pages/`) and utilities (`src/utils/`).

findings.title: Environment switch available
findings.suggestion: Provide env switching via dotenv/.env and `use.baseURL` or process.env variables in config.

findings.title: Tags/Filtering in config (grep/grepInvert)
findings.suggestion: Use `grep`/`grepInvert` in config to enable tag-based filtering globally.

findings.title: Tags/Filtering via npm scripts (--grep/-g)
findings.suggestion: Add scripts like `"test:smoke": "playwright test --grep @smoke"` in package.json.

findings.title: Spec files tagged (@smoke/@regression/...)
findings.message: A healthy portion of spec files include @tags
findings.suggestion: Append tags in titles, e.g., `test("login @smoke", ...)` or `describe("checkout @regression", ...)`.

findings.title: User impersonation / session reuse (storageState)
findings.suggestion: Use storageState to persist logged-in session and speed up tests.

findings.title: Custom fixtures (test.extend)
findings.suggestion: Create domain fixtures via test.extend for reusable setup and test data.

findings.title: Custom reporter (local path + hooks)
findings.suggestion: Configure reporter in playwright.config with a local path (e.g., ["./myReporter"]) and implement Reporter hooks (onBegin, onTestEnd, onEnd).

findings.title: Network mocks/intercepts
findings.suggestion: Use page.route/context.route to stub network and isolate tests.

findings.title: Parameterized environment data
findings.suggestion: Found .env.uat. Consider adding: .env.qa, .env.stage, .env.local.

findings.title: Sample env file committed (.env.example)
findings.suggestion: Commit a sanitized .env.example to document required variables.

findings.title: Secrets management (env/CI vars)
findings.suggestion: Use CI secrets & .env files; never commit secrets to VCS.

findings.title: Env variables wired in config
findings.suggestion: Load env via "import 'dotenv/config'" or dotenv.config() and reference process.env in playwright.config.*.

findings.title: No hardcoded secrets in repo (quick scan)
findings.suggestion: Remove hardcoded secrets. Use CI secrets or .env. Consider adding a pre-commit secret scanner (e.g., gitleaks, trufflehog).

findings.title: Artifacts directories present
findings.suggestion: Ensure CI preserves artifacts for debugging (test-results, trace, screenshots, downloads).

findings.title: Artifacts configured in Playwright config
findings.suggestion: Configure outputDir, screenshot, trace, and video in playwright.config.* to standardize artifact locations.

findings.title: Artifacts uploaded in CI
findings.suggestion: In GitHub Actions, use actions/upload-artifact to persist test-results/trace/screenshots on failures.

findings.title: .env files are gitignored
findings.suggestion: Add .env* to .gitignore to avoid leaking secrets.

findings.title: Artifacts are gitignored
findings.suggestion: Add test-results/, trace/, screenshots/, downloads/ to .gitignore to keep repo clean.

findings.title: Global setup/teardown present
findings.suggestion: Add global-setup.ts / global-teardown.ts for seeding/cleanup/session bootstrapping if needed.

findings.title: Global setup/teardown configured in Playwright
findings.suggestion: Wire globalSetup/globalTeardown in playwright.config.* if using those scripts.

findings.title: Storage state configured
findings.suggestion: Use storageState to reuse auth sessions and avoid re-login. Store files under ./.auth and reference in use.storageState.

findings.title: Auth directory present (.auth)
findings.suggestion: Prefer a dedicated .auth folder for session artifacts with proper .gitignore rules.

findings.title: Structured test data present (JSON/CSV/XLSX)
findings.suggestion: Maintain test data as JSON/CSV/XLSX in a dedicated folder (e.g., test-data/ or __fixtures__/).

findings.title: Dedicated test data folders
findings.suggestion: Use test-data/, __fixtures__/, or resources/ to separate data from tests and code.

findings.title: Environment schema validation library installed
findings.suggestion: Validate required env vars on startup with zod/envalid/joi/yup to fail fast on misconfigurations.

findings.title: Cleanup script for artifacts
findings.suggestion: Add "clean" script (rimraf test-results trace screenshots downloads) and run before/after CI jobs as needed.

findings.title: Prettier configured
findings.suggestion: Add .prettierrc or prettier.config.js and format scripts

findings.title: Pre-commit hooks (husky + lint-staged)
findings.suggestion: Add Husky and lint-staged to enforce formatting & linting before commits

findings.title: TypeScript strict mode
findings.suggestion: Set "compilerOptions.strict": true in tsconfig

findings.title: Avoid anti-patterns (e.g., waitForTimeout)
findings.suggestion: Prefer expect-based waiting or proper events over waitForTimeout

findings.title: PR/MR review template
findings.suggestion: Add .github/pull_request_template.md (or GitLab MR template)

findings.title: README present
findings.suggestion: Add a README with setup instructions & common scripts

findings.title: .editorconfig present
findings.suggestion: Add an .editorconfig to standardize editor settings across contributors

findings.title: Format script exists
findings.suggestion: Add "format": "prettier --check ." and/or "format:fix": "prettier --write ."

findings.title: Format script runs Prettier
findings.suggestion: Ensure your format scripts call Prettier, e.g., "prettier --check ." and "prettier --write ."

findings.title: Lint script exists
findings.suggestion: Add "lint": "eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx,.js" in package.json scripts

findings.title: Slack notifications
findings.message: No Slack notification configuration/usage was found (incoming webhook or Web API).

findings.title: Webhook notifications
findings.message: No generic webhook POST usage detected (axios/fetch/got to non-local URL).
